page_description: Portfolio of Lee Dongwon - Software Engineer specializing in web development
og_description: Experienced software engineer with expertise in React, Python, and system design

hero_subtitle: Building user-centered solutions with 2 years of experience
user_centered_desc: Throughout 2 years of programming experience, I have always prioritized user experience. By thinking from the user's perspective rather than developer convenience, I create truly useful systems.
proactivity_desc: Beyond basic school curriculum, I proactively learned practical technologies to become job-ready. Achieved A-rank on Paiza platform and continuously improved skills through practical projects.
responsibility_desc: Understanding that web applications are the first touchpoint for customers, I pay attention to every detail from design to usability. I provide continuous improvements and support based on customer feedback after release.
customer_oriented_desc: Through 2 years of customer service experience, I developed the ability to think from the customer's perspective rather than my own, which enhances my end-user focused development approach.
nextbeat_desc: Working as a full-stack engineer developing web applications and services.
seat_assignment_system: Seat Assignment System - Practical system with data storage and image export features
